name: Unknown Item
description: The Coin Decay Mechanic reduces the coin value of enemies that survive for extended periods, encouraging players to defeat enemies quickly.
title: Coin Decay Mechanic

mechanics.decay_threshold: Enemies lose 50% of their coin value if they are alive for more than 3 waves
mechanics.applies_to_all: This applies to all enemy types (Normal, Elite, Boss, Fleet)
mechanics.decay_type: The decay is a flat 50% reduction, not a gradual decrease
mechanics.reset_condition: The mechanic resets if an enemy is defeated and respawns

strategic_implications: Players are incentivized to defeat enemies quickly to maximize coin rewards
Enemies that survive multiple waves provide significantly less economic benefit
This creates a trade-off between defensive strategies and economic efficiency
Boss enemies that survive multiple waves become less valuable targets
economic_impact: Early wave enemies that survive become poor coin sources
Players should focus on clearing waves efficiently rather than letting enemies accumulate
The mechanic encourages active gameplay over passive strategies
Elite and Fleet enemies that survive multiple waves lose significant value
counterplay: Prioritize defeating enemies before they reach the 3-wave threshold
Use area-of-effect abilities to clear groups of enemies quickly
Focus on high-value enemies (Bosses, Elites) to prevent coin decay
Consider using ultimate weapons to clear waves efficiently
